text: Valbrand Fireblade, patron of Khorne and dreaded slaver of the seven seas carries a sword the size of a dozen men.
Sceolan of the Hooked Blade, Lord of Atylwyth, is the oldest and most cunning of the Wood Elf warriors.
Volrik Clawhand, touched by Tzeentch is a Khurgan Warlord dedicated to the ultimate schemer.
Zacharias the Everliving is an immensely powerful Vampire of the Necrarch bloodline that was exiled from the Forests of Shadows.
Torinubar has ruled over the Gates of Calith for centuries now in the name of the Phoenix Kings of Ulthuan, as such, he has become accustomed to managing the trade routes that pass through them.
The Bastard King of Icehorn Peak vows to ascend in to daemonhood and claim his place within Nurgle's garden.
Hrothyogg is considered the second most fiercesome Maneater. He is mostly known as the ''Toll Collector''. If you by chance pass his valley. one could either pay up, or face certain death.

Burlok Damminsson is a Master Engineer and current leader of the legendary Engineers Guild. Burlok's Ingenious Offensive New-matic Integrated Constrictor Arm (B.I.O.N.I.C.) was constructed by Burlok himself to replace his lost arm and is extremely strong, making him a powerful force on the battlefield.
Alphonsé Dolmance is both Bretonnian nobility and staunch worshipper of the God of Excess.
Thorgar the Blooded one, is the High Zar of the Khazags and infamous Warlord of the Khurgan Steppes.
The Undefeated destroyer of Khorne is the very paragon of the God of bloodlust, bringer of ruin.
Engra Deathsword was the right hand of Asavar Kul, he vanished after Kul's demise only to emerge to serve Archaeon.
Surtha Lenk, High Zar of the Tokmars tribe is a hunter of unmatched skill. Besting monsters ten times his own size, which is impressive in it's own right.
Lord Karitamen, as the Chosen of Phakth, embodies the might and favor of the God of Sky and Justice
Duriath Hellbane is one of the most feared corsairs under employ of the Witch King, tasked with the most dangerous expeditions.
Beorg, Son of Bran is a descendant of the Great Bear and is the mighty shapeshifting chieftain of the Ursfjordings Tribe.
Cyenwulf is the High Zar of the Iron Wolf tribe, a fearsome chaos tribe situated on the very edge of the mortal realms.
